actions.text: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Scanlon.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to request a study by the Federal Election Commission to specifically assess whether the small donor match cap and the six-to-one ratio in H.R.1 is appropriately scaled for both House and Senate elections.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to request a study by the Federal Election Commission to specifically assess whether the small donor match cap and the six-to-one ratio in H.R.1 is appropriately scaled for both House and Senate elections.
